channel.title: Whhy do i get this error when i run?my first server please help
channel.description:
everytime i try to run my server using the runserver.bat it pops up with this thing that says java is not reconized as a internal or external command,operable program or batch file.
idk what to do this my first server so help plz...also i have java installed for all and please tel me what problem is and how to fix
